Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 12 Sekkhattika » 12.1 Paṭiccavāra » 12.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
Sekkhattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
17.
1701Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṃ. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1702Paccanīyānulomaṃ.
Paṭiccavāro.
